products.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
products.description: Classic and creamy, our Vanilla Ice Cream is made with real vanilla beans for an authentic, rich flavor. The perfect blank canvas for your favorite toppings!

products.name: Choco Chips Ice Cream
products.description: Indulge in our Choco Chips Ice Cream, where velvety vanilla ice cream is swirled with generous chunks of rich chocolate. A satisfying treat for chocolate lovers!

products.name: Cone Ice Cream
products.description: Experience the classic joy of our Cone Ice Cream! Smooth, sweet ice cream meets a satisfyingly crunchy waffle cone for a nostalgic and delicious experience.

products.name: Amul Strawberry Ice Cream
products.description: Delight in our Strawberry Ice Cream, bursting with the vibrant sweetness of real strawberries swirled in a creamy base. A refreshing and fruity favorite!

products.name: Strawberry Ice Cream
products.description: Indulge in our Strawberry Ice Cream, bursting with the vibrant sweetness of real strawberries swirled in a creamy base. A refreshing and fruity favorite!

products.name: Black Currant Ice Cream
products.description: Savor the rich flavor of our Black Currant Ice Cream, filled with the goodness of real black currants blended into a creamy delight. A delightful treat for your taste buds!

products.name: Silk Unsweetened Almond Milk
products.description: Silk Unsweetened Almond Milk is a dairy-free, gluten-free, and vegan milk alternative that is low in calories and a good source of calcium. It is a great choice for those who are lactose intolerant or looking for a healthier alternative to dairy milk.

products.name: Amul Kool Cafe Coffee
products.description: Amul Kool Cafe Coffee is a ready-to-drink coffee beverage that is both refreshing and tasty. This is a great pick-me-up during a hot day!

products.name: Amul Lassi
products.description: Amul Lassi is a refreshing yogurt-based drink with a touch of sweetness. It is a traditional Indian beverage that is popular during the summer months.

products.name: Butter Milk
products.description: Buttermilk is a fermented dairy drink with a slightly sour taste. It is low in fat and a good source of calcium and protein.

products.name: Strawberry Lassi
products.description: Strawberry Lassi is a delightful yogurt-based drink blended with the sweetness of fresh strawberries. It's a refreshing and satisfying treat.

products.name: Amul Cheese
products.description: Amul Cheese is a popular processed cheese known for its mild and creamy flavor.

products.name: Cheddar Cheese
products.description: Cheddar cheese is a versatile cheese with a sharp, tangy flavor.

products.name: Mozzarella Cheese
products.description: Mozzarella is a stretchy, melty cheese that's perfect for pizza and other dishes.

products.name: Parmesan Cheese
products.description: Parmesan cheese is a hard, salty cheese that is commonly grated over pasta dishes.

products.name: Cottage Cheese
products.description: Cottage cheese is a soft, fresh cheese with a mild flavor.

products.name: Classic Dahi
products.description: Classic Dahi is a plain yogurt that is a staple in Indian cuisine.

products.name: Strawberry Yogurt
products.description: Strawberry yogurt is a creamy and sweet yogurt with the added flavor of strawberries.

products.name: Blueberry Yogurt
products.description: Blueberry yogurt is a creamy and flavorful yogurt with the added sweetness of blueberries.

products.name: Curd
products.description: Curd is a fermented milk product that is similar to yogurt. It has a slightly sour taste and is often used in Indian cooking.
